pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:0.5: 81. The training rule on what is expired
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.3: had assembled a group of senior monks, intending to give the full ordination to a trainee nun. But after seeing much staple and non-staple food, she dismissed the senior monks, saying,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.4: “Venerables, I won’t give the full ordination to the trainee nun just yet.” She then assembled Devadatta, Kokālika, Kaṭamodakatissaka, Khaṇḍadeviyā-putta, and Samuddadatta, and gave the full ordination to that trainee nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.5: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.6: “How could Venerable Thullanandā, with expired consent, give the full ordination to a trainee nun?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.7: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.10: “… How can the nun Thullanandā, with expired consent, give the full ordination to a trainee nun?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.11: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.12: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.13: ‘If, with expired consent, a nun gives the full ordination to a trainee nun, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.6: with a gathering that has left.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.8: one who has trained for two years in the six rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.11: If, intending to give the full ordination, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.12: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.13: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.14: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.15: the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.2.2: if she give her the full ordination while the gathering has not yet left;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.2.4: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.2.5: The eleventh training rule is finished.
